CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The target poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) ( PCDSeBT ) was obtained by Suzuki polymerization of M1 and M2 in degassed toluene / water with K 3 PO 4 as an organic base , Pd 2 ( dba ) 3 as a catalyst , and P(o-tol) 3 as the corresponding ligand at 90 °C for 3 days.

Let's think step by step.

1. The first material name entity in the paragraph is "poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole)" which is the target polymer and referred to as PCDSeBT.
2. The second material name entity is "toluene", which is used as a solvent in the polymerization process.
3. The third material name entity is "water", which is used as a solvent in the polymerization process.
4. The fourth material name entity is "K 3 PO 4", which is used as an organic base in the polymerization process.
5. The fifth material name entity is "Pd 2 ( dba ) 3", which is used as a catalyst in the polymerization process.
6. The sixth and final material name entity is "P(o-tol) 3", which is used as the corresponding ligand in the polymerization process.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) or PCDSeBT
2. Toluene
3. Water
4. K 3 PO 4
5. Pd 2 ( dba ) 3
6. P(o-tol) 3

These are the entities that clearly refer to Material Names in the given paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly(2,7-carbazole-alt-diselenienylbenzothiadiazole) or PCDSeBT |
| toluene |
| water |
| K 3 PO 4 |
| Pd 2 ( dba ) 3 |
| P(o-tol) 3 |
